LS_OnPremSql_properties_typeProperties_u.metadata: SQL login username for Azure SQL Managed Instance

LS_OnPremSql_properties_typeProperties_p.metadata: Key Vault secret name that stores the SQL password

LS_OnPremSql_properties_typeProperties_i.metadata: Name of the self-hosted Integration Runtime to use for LS_OnPremSql

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TableSchema, TableName, FilterColumn, UseDateRange, AllowFullDelete FROM dbo.AdfBackupConfig WHERE DeleteEnabled = 1 AND (Enabled = 1 OR Enabled IS NULL)

text.value: @{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Delete'', ''PL_DeleteRecords'', ''Delete'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Running'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''', pipeline().RunId, ''')')}

@{concat('DELETE FROM [', item().TableSchema, '].[', item().TableName, '] WHERE [', item().FilterColumn, '] >= ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''' AND [', item().FilterColumn, '] < ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, '''')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, RowsDeleted, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Delete'', ''PL_DeleteRecords'', ''Delete'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Succeeded'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', NULL, ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Delete'', ''PL_DeleteRecords'', ''Delete'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Failed'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''', activity('Delete_Rows_Full').error.errorCode, ''', ''', replace(activity('Delete_Rows_Full').error.message, '''', '""'), ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Delete'', ''PL_DeleteRecords'', ''Delete'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Failed'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''FULL_DELETE_BLOCKED'', ''Full-table delete is blocked. Set UseDateRange=1 with FilterColumn or AllowFullDelete=1 in dbo.AdfBackupConfig.'', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

typeProperties.message: Full-table delete is blocked. Set UseDateRange=1 with FilterColumn or AllowFullDelete=1 in dbo.AdfBackupConfig.

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT c.TableSchema, c.TableName, c.TargetFolder, c.FilterColumn, c.UseDateRange FROM dbo.AdfBackupConfig c INNER JOIN dbo.AdfTableExecutionOrder e ON e.SchemaName = c.TableSchema AND e.TableName = c.TableName WHERE c.BackupEnabled = 1 AND (c.Enabled = 1 OR c.Enabled IS NULL) AND e.IsEnabled = 1 ORDER BY e.BackupOrderLevel, c.TableSchema, c.TableName

sqlReaderQuery.value: @{if(or(equals(item().UseDateRange, 0), equals(item().FilterColumn, null)), concat('SELECT * FROM [', item().TableSchema, '].[', item().TableName, ']'), concat('SELECT * FROM [', item().TableSchema, '].[', item().TableName, '] WHERE [', item().FilterColumn, '] >= ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''' AND [', item().FilterColumn, '] < ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''''))}

text.value: @{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, RowsCopied, OutputFile, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Backup'', ''PL_BackupToParquet'', ''Backup'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Succeeded'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ', string(activity('Copy_Table_To_Parquet').output.rowsCopied), ', ''', concat(item().TargetFolder, '/dt=', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.StartDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.EndDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '/', item().TableSchema, '_', item().TableName, '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.StartDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.EndDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '.parquet'), ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Backup'', ''PL_BackupToParquet'', ''Backup'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Failed'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''', activity('Copy_Table_To_Parquet').error.errorCode, ''', ''', replace(activity('Copy_Table_To_Parquet').error.message, '''', '""'), ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT c.TableSchema, c.TableName, c.TargetFolder FROM dbo.AdfBackupConfig c INNER JOIN dbo.AdfTableExecutionOrder e ON e.SchemaName = c.TableSchema AND e.TableName = c.TableName WHERE c.RestoreEnabled = 1 AND (c.Enabled = 1 OR c.Enabled IS NULL) AND e.IsEnabled = 1 ORDER BY e.RestoreOrderLevel, c.TableSchema, c.TableName

text.value: @{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Restore'', ''PL_RestoreFromParquet'', ''Restore'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Running'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, RowsCopied, OutputFile, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Restore'', ''PL_RestoreFromParquet'', ''Restore'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Succeeded'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ', string(activity('Copy_Parquet_To_Table').output.rowsCopied), ', ''', concat(item().TargetFolder, '/dt=', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.StartDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.EndDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '/', item().TableSchema, '_', item().TableName, '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.StartDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '_', formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.EndDate,'yyyyMMdd'), '.parquet'), ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

@{concat('INSERT INTO dbo.AdfOrchestrationRunLog (RunId, OrchestrationName, PipelineName, StepName, TableSchema, TableName, Status, StartTimeUtc, EndTimeUtc, RangeStartUtc, RangeEndUtc, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage, CorrelationId) VALUES (''', variables('EffectiveRunId'), ''', ''Restore'', ''PL_RestoreFromParquet'', ''Restore'', ''', item().TableSchema, ''', ''', item().TableName, ''', ''Failed'', SYSUTCDATETIME(), SYSUTCDATETIME(), ''', pipeline().parameters.StartDate, ''', ''', pipeline().parameters.EndDate, ''', ''', activity('Copy_Parquet_To_Table').error.errorCode, ''', ''', replace(activity('Copy_Parquet_To_Table').error.message, '''', '""'), ''', ''', pipeline().runId, ''')')}

typeProperties.message: StartDate must be less than EndDate.
